title: (BUG) Eve invis does not start until damage taken on purple side!
body: {{champion:28} } After playing allot of eve ive found out that i have to take damage to go invisible at the start of the game when on purple side. This isnt a huge problem just should be addressed since eve on blue can actually solo invade level 1 apposed to purple side being pretty useless.

replies.body: nah man ur still invisible it just doesnt look like u are
ah thanks for letting me know
